page.title: 06TRADE AND INDUSTRY IN WGC.
page.content: In our area of {WGC}the majority of businesses is comprised of small industry. Warehouses have been built to store products in the local industrial area. {Polycell}make their goods in the nearby factory and store them in a large warehouse in our area. The majority of firms in our area are involved with the repair of damaged vehicles and with their regular servicing. There are also warehouses for tyre services and car accessories. There is a depot for heating oil and smokeless solid fuel. Other companies in the {Burrowfields}area produce plastic bottles,canoes,packaging card and delicate scientific instruments. The printers nearby produce newspapers and labels for local firms. On the { {Burrowfields}industrial site there are builders and plumbers who make use of the ample space for their yards.
